God would draw minds from the conviction of logic to a conviction deeper, higher, purer, and more glorious, a conviction unperverted by human logic. Human logic has often nearly quenched the light which God would have shine forth in clear rays to convince minds that the God of nature is 
                                                                           39
worthy of all praise and all glory, because He is the Creator of all things. 
                                   Ellen G. White.
